400.description: Empty image, or does not use "avatar" input key, or not valid image mime type or size

patch.summary: Uploads a user avatar, Use "avatar" value in input "name" attribute. Single image, jpg jpeg png extention, max size 5Mb.

400.description: Empty image, or does not use "avatar" input key, or not valid image mime type or size

post.summary: Upload a pet card , Use "avatar" value in input "name" attribute. Single image, jpg jpeg png extention, max size 5Mb, and "data" object with":" name(required*), birthday, breed, comments keys

Upload a notice , Use "avatar" value in input "name" attribute. Single image, jpg jpeg png extention, max size 5Mb, and "notice" object with":" title, location, price, category, comments keys , all field are required
